comment: Stop supporting the people who hate you and who support those who want to kill you and destroy your nation.
amr:
# ::snt Stop supporting the people who hate you and who support those who want to kill you and destroy your nation.
(s / stop-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (s2 / support-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / hate-01
                        :ARG1 y)
                  :ARG0-of (s3 / support-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (w / want-01
                                    :ARG1 (a / and
                                          :op1 (k / kill-01
                                                :ARG0 p2
                                                :ARG1 y)
                                          :op2 (d / destroy-01
                                                :ARG0 p2
                                                :ARG1 (n / nation
                                                      :poss y)))))))))

comment: Hi There, Please refrain from using racist or derogatory comments. They are hurtful and do not reflect the views of most people here. Thanks
amr:
# ::snt Hi There, Please refrain from using racist or derogatory comments. They are hurtful and do not reflect the views of most people here. Thanks
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :mod (t / there)))
      :snt2 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (o / or
                        :op1 (c / comment-01
                              :mod (r2 / racist))
                        :op2 (c2 / comment-01
                              :mod (d / derogatory))))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (h2 / hurt-01
                              :ARG0 (t2 / they))
                        :op2 (r3 / reflect-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 t2
                              :ARG2 (t3 / thing
                                    :ARG2-of (v / view-02
                                          :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                                :location (h3 / here)
                                                :quant (m2 / most))))))))
      :snt3 (t4 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 y))

comment: It may be time to stop eating dairy products if the name makes you hostile.
amr:
# ::snt It may be time to stop eating dairy products if the name makes you hostile.
(p / possible-01
      :ARG1 (t / time
            :time-of (s / stop-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (e / eat-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (p2 / product
                              :mod (d / dairy)))))
      :condition (m / make-02
            :ARG0 (t2 / thing
                  :ARG2-of (n / name-01))
            :ARG1 (h / hostile
                  :domain y)))

comment: Both "fa--ot" and anti-Islamic hatred are forbidden here. So make your point without them. Thank you!
amr:
# ::snt Both "fa--ot" and anti-Islamic hatred are forbidden here. So make your point without them. Thank you!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / forbid-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (h / hate-01
                        :ARG1 (r / religious-group
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Fa--ot")))
                  :op2 (h2 / hate-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / religious-group
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Islam"))))
            :location (h3 / here))
      :snt2 (c / cause-01
            :ARG1 (p / point-04
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :manner (a2 / accompany-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 (t / they)
                        :ARG1 y)))
      :snt3 (t2 / thank-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (y2 / you)))
